T02TD2519E:94a-22: g-yas pas dri 'thor ba dha ka brdung ba la brtson pa'i lha mo bzhis bskor ba /
T02TD2519E:94a-23: lcags kyu sngon po zhags pa ser po /
T02TD2519E:94a-25: dril bu sna tshogs ba'i mdog can ;
T02TD2519E:94a-26: bskal ba bzang po'i mthar thug pa 'di dag thams cad kyang gang la khyad par gyi bdag med pa der ni g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa /
T02TD2519E:94a-27: thugs kar khro bo'i sdigs mdzub bsgreng pa la brtson pa /
T02TD2519E:94a-28: g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi mtshan ma bsnams te tsham ngam gyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2519E:94a-29: gzhan yang drag po la sogs pa phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:94a-30: de la drag po ni mdog dkar po lag pa bzhi pa /
T02TD2519E:94a-31: g-yas kyi lag pa gcig gis au mal 'khyud pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-0: gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang bcas pas @94b mchog sbyin pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-1: g-yon pa gcig gis mdung rtse gsum pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-2: gnyis kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa khyu mchog la zhon pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-3: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa yod pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-4: rin po che'i cod pa na zla ba phyed pas brgyan pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-5: mgrin pa sngo bar bri bar bya ste //
T02TD2519E:94b-6: pa shu pa ti n'i la kantha au ma bri ya zhes smos pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2519E:94b-7: khyab 'jug mdog nag po lag pa bzhi pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-8: g-yas pa gnyis na dbyig pa dang rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-9: g-yon gnyis na dung dang 'khor lo thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-10: nam mkha' lding la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2519E:94b-11: rdo rje ser mo ni gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2519E:94b-12: lag pa na mtshon cha dang /
T02TD2519E:94b-14: rdo rje dril bu ni mdog dmar po gdong drug pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-15: lag pa g-yas gnyis na mdung thung dang rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-16: g-yon gnyis na khyim bya dang dril bu thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-18: rdo rje gzhon nu ma ni rdo rje dril bu dkrol par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:94b-19: thub pa'i rdo rje ni gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2519E:94b-20: gdong bzhi pa lag pa bzhi pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-21: g-yas gnyis na rdo rje dang bgrang phreng thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-22: g-yon gnyis na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-24: rdo rje zhi ba ma ni tshangs pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:94b-25: rdo rje mtshon cha ni mdog ser ba lag pa g-yon na rang gi rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-26: g-yas na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-27: glang po che dkar po la zhon pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-28: rdo rje khu tshur ni rdo rje mtshon cha dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:94b-29: khro bo rdo rje 'khyil pa ni mdog dmar po /
T02TD2519E:94b-30: lag pa g-yas kyis padma dang bcas pa'i rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-31: g-yon na padma dang bcas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-32: rtas drangs pa'i shing rta la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2519E:94b-33: rdo rje mi 'chi ba ni khro bo rdo rje 'khyil pa dang 'dra ba nyid do //
T02TD2519E:94b-34: khro bo rdo rje 'od ni mdog dkar po /
T02TD2519E:94b-35: lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-36: g-yon padma dang bcas pa'i zla ba thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-38: rdo rje ma dangs ni khro bo rdo rje 'od dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2519E:94b-39: khro bo rdo rje dbyig pa ni mdog sngon po //
T02TD2519E:94b-40: g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-41: g-yon na dbyig pa thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:94b-43: dbyug mchog ma ni khro bo rdo rje dbyug pa dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2519E:94b-44: khro bo rdo rje ser smug ni /
T02TD2519E:95a-0: @95a * // mdog dmar po lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-1: g-yon na mi mgo thogs nas za zhing gnas pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-2: rdo rje rked 'chings [?] ma ni khro bo rdo rje ser smug dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2519E:95a-3: rdo rje glang po'i sna ni tshogs kyi bdag po ste /
T02TD2519E:95a-4: mdog dkar po lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa g-yon na gshol thogs te gnas pa glang po che la zhon pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-5: rdo rje 'ju ma ni glang sna dang 'dra ba las khyad par ni 'di yod de /
T02TD2519E:95a-6: 'di ltar lag pa g-yon na kha tv'am ga thogs pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95a-7: tshogs kyi bdag po khro bo rdo rje phreng ba ni mdog ljang gu /
T02TD2519E:95a-8: lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-9: g-yon me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-11: rdo rje za ba mo ni rdo rje phreng ba dang 'dra ba las /
T02TD2519E:95a-12: de las khyad par ni 'di yod do //
T02TD2519E:95a-13: 'di ltar lag pa g-yon na mdung rtse yod pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95a-14: rdo rje dbang ni mdog ser po lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-15: g-yon na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa phag la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95a-16: rdo rje rta mgo ma ni rdo rje dbang dang 'dra ba las /
T02TD2519E:95a-17: khyad par ni 'di yod de 'di ltar kha dog dmar ba yin no //
T02TD2519E:95a-18: tshogs kyi bdag po ni rnam par rgyal ba ni mdog dmar po /
T02TD2519E:95a-19: lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-20: g-yon na ral gri thogs pa tsan du ka la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95a-21: rdo rje dga' mo ni rnam par rgyal ba dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2519E:95a-22: pho nya rdo rje tho ba ni mdog ser po lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-23: g-yon na sen ma dza ka ni ka thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-26: me tog can gyi dril zhon par ni 'di yod de /
T02TD2519E:95a-27: 'di ltar lag pa g-yon na kha tv'am ga thogs pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95a-28: pho nya mo rdo rje rlung ni mdog sngon po /
T02TD2519E:95a-29: lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-30: g-yon na ba dan thogs pa rig dags la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95a-31: pho nya rdo rje ma ni mdog dmar po lag pa g-yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang dgang gzar thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-32: g-yon gnyis na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-33: 'od zer gyen du 'bar ba 'bar ba'i rtse gsum pa /
T02TD2519E:95a-35: rdo rje 'bar ba mo ni pho nya rdo rje 'bar ba dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2519E:95a-36: mgyogs ma rdo rje ma ni pho nya rdo rje rlung dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2519E:95a-37: pho nya rdo rje 'jigs pa ni mdog sngon po /
T02TD2519E:95b-0: lag pa g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na dbyig pa @95b thogs pa mi ro la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95b-1: pho nya mo rdo rje 'khyor ma ni rdo rje 'jigs pa dang 'dra ba las /
T02TD2519E:95b-2: khyad par ni lag pa g-yon na zhags pa thogs pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95b-3: bran mo rdo rje lcags kyu ni /
T02TD2519E:95b-5: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-6: g-yon na lcags kyu thogs pa klu'i rgyal po she sha la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95b-7: bran mo rdo rje kha ni mdog sngon mo /
T02TD2519E:95b-8: phag gi mgo can lag pa g-yas na rdo rje /
T02TD2519E:95b-9: g-yon na ral gri thogs pa mi la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95b-10: bran mo rdo rje dus ni mdog nag po lag pa g-yas da rdo rje /
T02TD2519E:95b-11: g-yon na gshin rje'i dbyug pa thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-13: / bran mo rdo rje dus ma ni mdog nag mo /
T02TD2519E:95b-14: lag pa g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na kha tv'am ga thogs pa ro langs la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95b-15: bran rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo ni mdog dkar po glang po'i mdog can /
T02TD2519E:95b-16: lag pa g-yas gnyis na rdo rje dang dgra sta thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-17: g-yon gnyis nam dung rtse gsum pa dang so thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-19: pho nya mo rdul ma ni mdog sngon mo /
T02TD2519E:95b-20: lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-21: g-yon na sen ma dza ka ni ka thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-23: bran rdo rje glang ma ni mdog dkar po lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-24: g-yon na rdo rje zhags pa thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-27: bran mo chu srin ma ni mdog dkar po /
T02TD2519E:95b-28: lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-29: g-yon na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-31: 'jigs pa mchod ljang gu lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-32: g-yon na ral gri dang phu thogs pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95b-33: dpal mo mdog ser mo la lag pa g-yas na rdo rje /
T02TD2519E:95b-35: dbyangs can ma mdog dmar mo //
T02TD2519E:95b-36: lag pa g-yas na rdo rje /
T02TD2519E:95b-37: g-yon na pi wang thogs pa'o //
T02TD2519E:95b-38: dka' thub bzlog pa mdog ljang gu /
T02TD2519E:95b-39: lag pa g-yas gnyis na rdo rje dang 'khor lo thogs pa /
T02TD2519E:95b-40: g-yon gnyis na pa ti sa dang ral gri thogs pa ma mo thams cad dang /
T02TD2519E:95b-41: drag po la sogs pa nas chu lha'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi lag pa g-yas na rdo rje thogs pa gang yin pa de rtse gsum pa yin pa shes par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:96a-1: dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mngon sum du phyogs par bri'o //
T02TD2519E:96a-2: de nas dgongs ka'i dus la babs pa na /
T02TD2519E:96a-3: rdo rje ti t'inti ri'i phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2519E:96a-4: yi ge h'um bzhi zlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byas la /
T02TD2519E:96a-5: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lhag pa dang /
T02TD2519E:96a-6: mtshang ba nye bar zhi ba'i phyir bltas la /
T02TD2519E:96a-7: rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phreng ba 'di phul te /
T02TD2519E:96a-8: rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs la yi ge h'um bzhis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:96a-10: rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas //
T02TD2519E:96a-11: mkhas pas mtshang yongs su bskang //
T02TD2519E:96a-12: lhag pa gang yin 'dor mdzad pa //
T02TD2519E:96a-15: de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni //
T02TD2519E:96a-16: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag bas //
T02TD2519E:96a-17: rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po //
T02TD2519E:96a-18: yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya //
T02TD2519E:96a-19: aom badzrod gha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha h'um /
T02TD2519E:96a-21: rdo rje mdzub mo yang dag par //
T02TD2519E:96a-22: sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su //
T02TD2519E:96a-23: rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni //
T02TD2519E:96a-24: sgo 'byed pa yi mchog yin no //
T02TD2519E:96a-25: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bya'o //
T02TD2519E:96a-26: de nas rin po che sna bdun nam /
T02TD2519E:96a-27: sa las byas pa'i bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag pa /
T02TD2519E:96a-34: 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su dgang zhing /
T02TD2519E:96a-35: 'bras bu dang bcas shing lo ma dang bcas pa'i ldum bus kha brgyan pa /
T02TD2519E:96a-36: mgrin pa ras dkar pos bcings nas srung ba byas la phyi rol kun du dri zhim pos byugs te /
T02TD2519E:96a-37: steng du rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2519E:96a-38: rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /
T02TD2519E:96a-39: khro bo ti r'inti ris yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2519E:96a-40: me tog gi lcug ma las /
T02TD2519E:96a-42: zhes bya ba 'dis lan stod rtsa brgyad bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2519E:96a-43: h'um bzhi pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par gzhag go //
T02TD2519E:96b-0: bum pa gnyis pa @96b la h'um bzhi lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas /
T02TD2519E:96b-1: 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par gzhag go //
T02TD2519E:96b-2: chu des bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ba'am /
T02TD2519E:96b-3: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:96b-4: byi ru dang ni sa le sbram //
T02TD2519E:96b-5: dung dang mu tig nor bu dang //
T02TD2519E:96b-6: rin chen kun zhes bya ba la ;
T02TD2519E:96b-7: lnga po 'di dag shes par bya //
T02TD2519E:96b-8: sing ha by'a ghri ki ri karni /
T02TD2519E:96b-9: ha sa sa ha de ba ste //
T02TD2519E:96b-10: sman rnams kun zhes bya ba la //
T02TD2519E:96b-11: lnga po 'di dag shes par bya //
T02TD2519E:96b-12: 'bras kyi so ba mon sran gre'u //
T02TD2519E:96b-13: nas dang gro dang til dag ste //
T02TD2519E:96b-14: 'bru rnams kun zhes bya ba la //
T02TD2519E:96b-15: lnga po 'di dag shes par bya ;
T02TD2519E:96b-16: / de'i rjes la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD2519E:96b-17: sngom pa gzung bar byas nas ras sngon po la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2519E:96b-18: sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi gtsug tor bcing ba dang /
T02TD2519E:96b-20: rdo rje go chas stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD2519E:96b-21: gtsug tor la brtsegs pa bgos nas /
T02TD2519E:96b-22: slob dpon khro bo ti r'inti ris me tog gi phreng ba sngon po bzung la /
T02TD2519E:96b-23: aom badzra sa ma ya pra be sha mi zhes zlos shing zhugs la /
T02TD2519E:96b-24: bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te /
T02TD2519E:96b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:96b-26: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la bdag nyid la dbab par byas nas /
T02TD2519E:96b-27: me tog de dkyil 'khor chen por ngor la rang gi mgo la bcings nas gdong g-yogs bkrol te /
T02TD2519E:96b-28: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bltas nas /
T02TD2519E:96b-29: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bar byas la /
T02TD2519E:96b-31: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2519E:96b-35: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te ;
T02TD2519E:96b-36: bcom ldan 'das las de blangs nas //
T02TD2519E:96b-39: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang blangs nas me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2519E:96b-40: sgeg mo la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa lngas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2519E:97a-2: lung bstan pa yang blangs la /
T02TD2519E:97a-3: yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin du bzlas pa byas nas bdag gi h'um mdzad rdo rje'o zhes rang gi ming nas brjod pa byas la /
T02TD2519E:97a-4: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2519E:97a-5: de'i sngags aa zhes bya ba'i mtha' dang bcas pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:97a-6: badzra ham zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal du rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2519E:97a-7: rdo rje de badzra dha tu ra ham zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad du bsgom par bya'o ;
T02TD2519E:97a-8: / de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2519E:97a-10: de'i sngags aa zhes bya ba'i mtha' dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bur bdag nyid dbab par byas la /
T02TD2519E:97a-11: badzra ghande ho zhes nga rgyal bskyed nas /
T02TD2519E:97a-12: de badzra a'a be sha kro dha ham zhes khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:97a-13: de ltar na rdo rje bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:97a-14: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2519E:97a-15: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02TD2519E:97a-16: se gol mang po brdab bgyis la //
T02TD2519E:97a-17: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
T02TD2519E:97a-18: aom badzra sa ma ya dza: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:97a-19: de nas rdo rje khro bo yi //
T02TD2519E:97a-20: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02TD2519E:97a-21: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02TD2519E:97a-22: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi'o //
T02TD2519E:97a-23: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas rang rang gi sgo nas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2519E:97a-27: h'um bzhi pas mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2519E:97a-28: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzlas nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:97a-30: dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2519E:97a-32: de nas rang gi sngags dang snying po brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:97a-34: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bshad de /
T02TD2519E:97a-35: rdo rje gnyis las byung ba ni //
T02TD2519E:97a-36: dam tshig mchog tu grags pa yin //
T02TD2519E:97a-37: de dag bcing ba bshad bya ba //
T02TD2519E:97a-38: khro bo bcing ba bla na med //
T02TD2519E:97a-39: lag ngar rdo rjer byas nas su //
T02TD2519E:97a-40: mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya //
T02TD2519E:97a-41: mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni //
T02TD2519E:97b-0: 'jig @97b rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya //
T02TD2519E:97b-1: de bzhin mdzub mo ngos sbyar te //
T02TD2519E:97b-2: nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgug / gung mo mnyam bsgreng padmar bya //
T02TD2519E:97b-3: gung mo mdzub mo gnyis kas bsdigs //
T02TD2519E:97b-4: mdzub mo gnyis ka rdo rjer bya //
T02TD2519E:97b-5: g-yas pa lcags kyu dgug par bya //
T02TD2519E:97b-6: de nyid h'um zhes bya bar 'dud ;
T02TD2519E:97b-7: / legs pa sbyin pa de bzhin te //
T02TD2519E:97b-8: mdzub gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer mar gzhag / snying gar mdzub mos nyi mar bskor //
T02TD2519E:97b-9: lag pa brkyang ste spyi bor gzhag / mdzub mo kha nas dgod ltar byas //
T02TD2519E:97b-10: mdzub mo'i sen mo sbyar bar bya //
T02TD2519E:97b-11: g-yas pas ral gri bcings pa'o //
T02TD2519E:97b-12: gung mdzub mnyam bsgreng 'khor lo yi //
T02TD2519E:97b-13: kha yi nang nas dbyung ba dang //
T02TD2519E:97b-14: mdzub mo gung mor rdo rjer bya //
T02TD2519E:97b-15: mdzub mo yis ni mgul bar bskor //
T02TD2519E:97b-16: mdzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che //
T02TD2519E:97b-17: mdzub mo gnyis ni rdo rjer bcings //
T02TD2519E:97b-18: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa nyid la h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje bsdams pa de ji lta ba bzhin du bcings so //
T02TD2519E:97b-19: snying gar mthe bo bsnyams la gzhag / rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o //
T02TD2519E:97b-20: thal mo sbyar te kha nas byung //
T02TD2519E:97b-21: gar las thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag / rdo rje bcings pa thur du blugs //
T02TD2519E:97b-22: rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor //
T02TD2519E:97b-23: mthe bong mnyam ste rab tu bsdams //
T02TD2519E:97b-24: rab tu brkyang ste byug pa'o //
T02TD2519E:97b-25: mdzub mo gcig po dgug pa'o //
T02TD2519E:97b-26: mthe bo gnyis ni mdud pa dor //
T02TD2519E:97b-27: mthe bo mdzub mo gdu bur bcing //
T02TD2519E:97b-28: rdo rje khu tshur mdzub mo bsdams //
T02TD2519E:97b-29: thugs kar yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2519E:97b-30: yi ge h'um nyid zlos shing phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:97b-31: de nas phyag rgya'i nges pa bshad de //
T02TD2519E:97b-32: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2519E:97b-37: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi gnas nyid do //
T02TD2519E:97b-38: de nas rin chen h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags bshad de /
T02TD2519E:97b-39: aom badzra bhri ku ti kro dha na ya sarba ratna ma hr'i: phat /
T02TD2519E:97b-40: aom badzra drisht'i kro dha dri shu m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD2519E:97b-41: aom badzra bi shva kro dha ku ru sarba bi shva r'u pa tra ya sa da ya h'um phat /
T02TD2519E:97b-42: 'di'i phyag rgya ni sems ma rdo rje ma nas brtsams te blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:98a-2: /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad //
T02TD2519E:98a-4: rdo rje de dang h'um mdzad kyis phyag rgya'i tshogs bsdus pa ni /
T02TD2519E:98a-5: 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad yin par bshad kyi //
T02TD2519E:98a-6: rdo rje h'um mdzad gzhan du gyur pa ni mi rigs te /
T02TD2519E:98a-7: rgyud thams cad las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad yin par bstan to //
T02TD2519E:98a-8: de'i rjes la de bzhin du ljags la rdo rje bkod de /
T02TD2519E:98a-9: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi ge dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:98a-11: h'um ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'o ;
T02TD2519E:98a-12: / tr'am ni rin chen sems ma'i'o //
T02TD2519E:98a-13: hr'i: ni chos kyi sems ma'i'o //
T02TD2519E:98a-14: aa ni las kyi sems ma'i'o //
T02TD2519E:98a-18: aa karma badzri h'um he tram ta /
T02TD2519E:98a-19: hi hi de ha dhi ka /
T02TD2519E:98a-22: bam dri aa: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i'o //
T02TD2519E:98a-32: aa ha h'um h'um h'um he spho ta bam h'um /
T02TD2519E:98a-33: ghanda aa aa h'um zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2519E:98a-34: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi yin no //
T02TD2519E:98a-35: de'i rjes la yi ge aa las thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:98a-37: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis byas la //
T02TD2519E:98a-38: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo no //
T02TD2519E:98a-39: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02TD2519E:98a-40: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD2519E:98a-41: sangs rgyas byang chub spyin byed pa'o //
T02TD2519E:98a-42: bsgying [*bsgyings] bcas bsor bas gnyis ga yis ;
T02TD2519E:98a-43: / zhes pa ni rin chen h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2519E:98a-46: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang //
T02TD2519E:98a-47: mda' 'phang ba yi tshul dang ni //
T02TD2519E:98a-48: legs so zhes pa snying gar bshad //
T02TD2519E:98a-49: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis //
T02TD2519E:98a-50: zhes bya ba ni rin chen h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2519E:98a-51: khro bo rdo rje khro gnyer can dang /
T02TD2519E:98a-53: snying gar nyi ma brtan par bya //
T02TD2519E:98a-54: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //
T02TD2519E:98a-55: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
T02TD2519E:98a-56: g-yas pa yi ni g-yon pa dbye //
T02TD2519E:98a-57: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2519E:98b-0: @98b snying gar g-yon ba ral gre mdung //
T02TD2519E:98b-1: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02TD2519E:98b-2: rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2519E:98b-3: rdo rje gar bskor dgrol ba yis //
T02TD2519E:98b-4: thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag / ces bya ba ni las kyi h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2519E:98b-7: go cha mthe chung mche ba mchog / khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o //
T02TD2519E:98b-8: rdo rje bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02TD2519E:98b-9: bsam pa g-yos pas sdud par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:98b-10: phreng ba bcings pa kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2519E:98b-11: gar las thal sbyar spyi bor bzhag / thur du blugs dang gyen du gtor //
T02TD2519E:98b-12: mthe bong mnyam te rab tu bsdams //
T02TD2519E:98b-13: rab tu brkyang nas byug pa ni //
T02TD2519E:98b-14: mchod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bstan //
T02TD2519E:98b-15: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni //
T02TD2519E:98b-16: mthe chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02TD2519E:98b-17: mchod pa'i mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub //
T02TD2519E:98b-18: rgyab gnyis kyang ni mnyam ste mnan //
T02TD2519E:98b-19: sgo srung gi ni phyag rgya kun ;
T02TD2519E:98b-20: / las kyi phyag rgya gar las byung //
T02TD2519E:98b-21: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su 'brangs te bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:98b-22: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2519E:98b-25: las kyi khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni sems ma rdo rje dang /
T02TD2519E:98b-28: rdo rje las ma yang yin pa las 'di rnams ni rdo rje'i nang du chud pa'i lha mo'i gzugs 'dzin ma yin //
T02TD2519E:98b-29: bdag nyid chen po gang gang gis //
T02TD2519E:98b-30: phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa //
T02TD2519E:98b-31: bzlas pa'i snying po'i don du ni //
T02TD2519E:98b-32: der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
T02TD2519E:98b-33: zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi dam tshig go //
T02TD2519E:98b-34: g-yon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bkan la /
T02TD2519E:98b-35: lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang /
T02TD2519E:98b-36: mthe bo gnyis kyi mthe'u chung nas brtsams te /
T02TD2519E:98b-37: phye nas thal mo khang stong du bya ba 'di ni byams pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2519E:98b-38: 'di rnams kyi rig pa yang sngar bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2519E:98b-39: rig pa de nyid de rnams kyi ljags la bkod pa 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:98b-40: yi ge aa las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la bris pa dang /
T02TD2519E:99a-1: par de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:99a-2: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la bris pa dang rjes su mthun pa kho nar de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:99a-3: rig pa de nyid kyang spyi yin no //
T02TD2519E:99a-4: mthe bos mthe'u chung bcings nas ni /
T02TD2519E:99a-5: g-yon pa sor mo dbus ma gsum //
T02TD2519E:99a-6: rtse gsum pa yi dbus ma rtse //
T02TD2519E:99a-7: rdo rje phyag rgyar bzung ba ste //
T02TD2519E:99a-8: rdo rje rig pa dam pa ste //
T02TD2519E:99a-9: rdo rje mthu zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2519E:99a-10: de nas rab tu bshad pa ni //
T02TD2519E:99a-11: rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs btags //
T02TD2519E:99a-12: rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te ;
T02TD2519E:99a-13: / g-yon pa rdo rje bcing bar bya //
T02TD2519E:99a-14: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad de //
T02TD2519E:99a-15: rdo rje rigs ni kun gyi 'di'o //
T02TD2519E:99a-16: rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te /
T02TD2519E:99a-17: mtshan ma kun ni nges gzhag go //
T02TD2519E:99a-18: rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi //
T02TD2519E:99a-19: phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba de //
T02TD2519E:99a-20: mdun du brkyang ste bzhag pa dang //
T02TD2519E:99a-21: mdzub mo mtheb bstan bcas pa dang //
T02TD2519E:99a-22: aom zhes bya ba spyi bor sbyar //
T02TD2519E:99a-23: rdo rje steng du bzhag pa'o //
T02TD2519E:99a-24: rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs rnams so //
T02TD2519E:99a-25: rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa //
T02TD2519E:99a-26: lag pa'i rgyab tu de bzhin te //
T02TD2519E:99a-27: khu tshur brkyang la lag ngar bskum //
T02TD2519E:99a-28: kha phyogs su ni bskor bar bya //
T02TD2519E:99a-29: rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
T02TD2519E:99a-30: g-yon pa'i mthe bo'i steng du gzhag / phreng ba bcings pa'i thabs su sbyar //
T02TD2519E:99a-31: nor sbyin par ni g-yas pa ste //
T02TD2519E:99a-32: ral gri phyag rgya khu tshur gcig / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
T02TD2519E:99a-33: g-yas pa mdun du mdung ring 'dzin //
T02TD2519E:99a-34: lag pa brkyang pa'ang de bzhin te //
T02TD2519E:99a-36: rdo rje khu tshur bskyod pa'o //
T02TD2519E:99a-37: pho nya'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so //
T02TD2519E:99a-38: bsgyings bcas mdzub mo khar mche ba //
T02TD2519E:99a-39: dbyug pa bsnun cing mnan pa dang //
T02TD2519E:99a-40: dbung pa bskum zhing bcar ba dang //
T02TD2519E:99a-42: bran gyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so //
T02TD2519E:99a-43: de nas au ma la sogs pa'i ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:99a-44: g-yon pa rdo rje mdzub bcings pas //
T02TD2519E:99a-45: rtse gsum mtshan ma mnan par bya //
T02TD2519E:99b-0: 'di @99b bcings pas ni yang dag par //
T02TD2519E:99b-2: rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi //
T02TD2519E:99b-3: g-yon pa rdo rje gtso bor 'dus //
T02TD2519E:99b-4: dam tshig go na ji bzhin par //
T02TD2519E:99b-5: phyag rgya bcing bar bshad par bya //
T02TD2519E:99b-6: thams cad 'khor lo sor rtse gsum //
T02TD2519E:99b-7: dril bu'i phyag rgya de bzhin no ;
T02TD2519E:99b-8: / de bzhin aom gyi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2519E:99b-9: seng ge'i rnam par yongs su bzung //
T02TD2519E:99b-10: rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnams so //
T02TD2519E:99b-13: dbyig pa'i khu tshur 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2519E:99b-15: khro bo'i dam tshig rnams so //
T02TD2519E:99b-16: btud pa'i phyag rgya dang phrad pa //
T02TD2519E:99b-17: rdo rjes mnan nas btud pa ste //
T02TD2519E:99b-18: spyi bor gzhag pa tshogs kyi ste //
T02TD2519E:99b-20: tshogs rnams kyi ni dam tshig go //
T02TD2519E:99b-21: lag pa bskum pa khar bzhag ste //
T02TD2519E:99b-22: rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya //
T02TD2519E:99b-23: 'bar dang me stag stong pa ste //
T02TD2519E:99b-24: de nas khar yang gnas par bya //
T02TD2519E:99b-25: pho nya mo'i dam tshig rnams so //
T02TD2519E:99b-26: mtha' ma gnyis ni khar bcug dang //
T02TD2519E:99b-27: gcod cing rab tu gnon pa'o //
T02TD2519E:99b-28: dpung pa bsnol bas bsnol ba dang //
T02TD2519E:99b-29: myur du phyogs pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD2519E:99b-30: bran mo rnams kyi dam dam tshig go //
T02TD2519E:99b-31: de nas lha chen po la sogs pa'i lce la de'i sngags dgod pa 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:99b-32: yi ge aa las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje de bzhin du bskyed la /
T02TD2519E:99b-33: de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni /
T02TD2519E:99b-35: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms la /
T02TD2519E:99b-36: phyag rgya chen po bris pa dang rjes su mthun par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:99b-37: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2519E:99b-38: bskal pa bzang po rnams dang /
T02TD2519E:99b-39: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:99b-40: dpal h'um mdzad la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas lnga'i cong pan dang /
T02TD2519E:99b-42: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:99b-43: de nas mchod yon phul la mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2519E:99b-44: de la re zhig rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa'i bum pa sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa /
T02TD2519E:100a-0: @100a * // rdo rje la sogs pa rang rang gi mtshan ma can la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa dang bum pa gang ba rnams phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:100a-6: thams cad la spyir zung gcag dbul ba'am /
T02TD2519E:100a-7: bla re rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2519E:100a-8: grva bzhir pa dan sna tshogs btags pa dang /
T02TD2519E:100a-11: ba dan rnams kyang aom dang rdo rje h'um mdzad yongs su bzlas shing badzra sphar na kham zhes bya ba 'dis lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:100a-15: shing dang me tog thams cad kyang rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2519E:100a-16: aom badzra pushpe h'um zhes bya ba me tog gi phyag rgya dang bcas pas me tog la mngon par bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2519E:100a-17: byug pa ni dri zhim zhing dri bzang pos bsgos pa'i dri bzang po thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:100a-19: aom badzra gandhe zhes bya ba 'di'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2519E:100a-23: tsandan la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba la /
T02TD2519E:100a-25: aom badzra dh'u pe h'um zhes bya ba 'dis bdug spos kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas /
T02TD2519E:100a-34: de bzhin du mar me'i snod chen po sdong bu 'bar ba dang bcas pa stong ngam /
T02TD2519E:100a-36: bcu'am gcig la rdo rje me dang aom badzra a'a lo ke /
T02TD2519E:100a-37: zhes bya ba 'di mar me'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2519E:100a-38: badzra sphar na kham zhes zlos shing dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:100a-39: sve bhe ka la sogs pa lha bshos kyi zhal zas 'bum mam /
T02TD2519E:100a-44: bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa la de bzhin du rdo rje me yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2519E:100a-45: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpa natv'a ta ces zlos shing dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:100a-46: rol mo'i cha byad bcu po'am /
T02TD2519E:100b-0: rol mo'i cha byad bcu po h'um zhes bya ba @100b dang ;
T02TD2519E:100b-1: rol mo'i phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi sor mo rnams kyis de'i tshul du byed pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:100b-2: rol mo'i cha byad bcu po ni pi wang gling bu dang /
T02TD2519E:100b-10: ti mi li brdung ba'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02TD2519E:100b-11: phyi rol du gar dang rol mo bya ba dang /
T02TD2519E:100b-12: cod pan dang gdu bu dang /
T02TD2519E:100b-13: rna rgyan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang /
T02TD2519E:100b-14: aom zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas te dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:100b-15: de bzhin du dar dpyangs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2519E:100b-16: me tog chun 'phyang gi rnam par brgyan pa dang /
T02TD2519E:100b-17: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa dang /
T02TD2519E:100b-18: rta dang glang po che dang /
T02TD2519E:100b-19: ba lang gi khyu shin tu btags pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:100b-20: rta babs yid du 'ong ba dril bu la sogs pa btags pa yang badzra spha ra na zhes bya ba 'dis 'bul lo ;
T02TD2519E:100b-21: / aom badzra satva su sam gra ha ta /
T02TD2519E:100b-25: zhes zlos shing gar byas la /
T02TD2519E:100b-26: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis ma gtogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:100b-27: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2519E:100b-28: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis su 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:100b-29: yang rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcu drug gis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2519E:100b-30: khro bo'i rigs thams cad la dngos grub thams cad grub pa'i phyir /
T02TD2519E:100b-31: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzod cig ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:100b-32: de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la /
T02TD2519E:100b-33: phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:100b-34: 'bras yos bya zhing til dang bcas //
T02TD2519E:100b-35: 'bras chen me tog chu dang bcas //
T02TD2519E:100b-36: sran chan bcas shing mang du bya //
T02TD2519E:100b-37: snum khur la sogs bza' ba rnams //
T02TD2519E:100b-38: zhes bya ba'i gtor ma la aa k'a ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas nas /
T02TD2519E:100b-39: shar phyogs nas brtsams te gsum gsum gtor bar bya zhing dri dang me tog dang /
T02TD2519E:101a-2: mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang tha mar 'bul lo //
T02TD2519E:101a-3: de la dang por re zhig mandala rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:101a-4: de nas ni spyan drang ngo //
T02TD2519E:101a-5: de nas dam tshig bstan la mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2519E:101a-6: dri la sogs pas legs par mchod la gtor ma phul te de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:101a-7: de nas sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin te /
T02TD2519E:101a-8: shar phyogs su kha bltas te /
T02TD2519E:101a-9: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug nas /
T02TD2519E:101a-10: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan la /
T02TD2519E:101a-11: g-yas pa'i rdo rje phyag rgya sta zur phyogs su bzhag ste /
T02TD2519E:101a-12: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar spyan drangs pa ni brgya byin gyi spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101a-13: de la mdzub mo lcags kyur ma byas pa ni brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101a-14: rkang pa g-yon brkyang pa'i tshul gyis 'dug la /
T02TD2519E:101a-15: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101a-16: de nas 'di'i sngags na mo badzra sya tsa di shi di shi badzra pa ne raksha raksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:101a-17: me'i phyogs su bltas nas lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug ste /
T02TD2519E:101a-18: gung mo'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la ;
T02TD2519E:101a-19: mthe bo lag mthil du bzhag pa ni me lha spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101a-20: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bo ngos las mdzub mo btsugs pa ni me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101a-21: phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo mthe bo'i ngos la btsugs te phyir drag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101a-22: de'i sngags ni aagna ye h'um ae hya k'a ba li dzva la dzva la d'a ha shi khi to li pi r'u paksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:101a-23: gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas nas snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste /
T02TD2519E:101a-24: sor mo phan tshun bsnol la khu tshur bcangs nas srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te /
T02TD2519E:101a-25: gshibs la g-yab ste nang du bzhag pa ni gshin rje spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101a-26: srin lag gnyis ka yang phyi rol tu de bzhin du gshibs te bsgreng ba snying gar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101a-27: de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101a-28: sngags ni ya m'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:101b-0: bden @101b bral gyi phyogs su rkang pa mnyam pas 'dug la /
T02TD2519E:101b-1: lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo dang gung mo ral gri 'dra bar gshibs te bsgreng la bzhag / lag pa g-yon pa de ltar byas te /
T02TD2519E:101b-2: sta zur phyogs su bzhag la /
T02TD2519E:101b-3: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste g-yab pa ni bden bral spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101b-4: phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g-yon pa sta zur phyogs su ral gri 'dra bar bzhag pa ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101b-5: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101b-6: sngags ni sarba bhu ta ba yam ka ra ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:101b-7: chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam pas 'dug la /
T02TD2519E:101b-8: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs la /
T02TD2519E:101b-9: mthe bo dang mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te /
T02TD2519E:101b-10: zhags mig ltar byas la g-yon pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas te /
T02TD2519E:101b-11: snying gar bzhag la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur byas pa ni chu lha spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101b-12: phyag rgya de nyid las g-yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyi tshul du bzhag pa las zhags mig ltar byas pa ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101b-13: g-yon pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101b-14: sngags ni aom tr'ing t'i bu tra tra'i tra'i shi khi ti /
T02TD2519E:101b-15: li pi r'u pa ksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:101b-16: rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug la /
T02TD2519E:101b-17: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs te gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs dang por mdzub mo bkug pa'i thor to btsugs la /
T02TD2519E:101b-18: lag pa g-yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2519E:101b-19: sta zur logs su bzhag cing mthe bong bsgul ba ni rlung lha spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101b-20: de nyid las mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101b-21: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bo brkyang ba ni slar btang pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:101b-22: sngags ni aom sva sa kha kha mu kha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:101b-23: ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du bzlog ste /
T02TD2519E:101b-24: mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la brkyang de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor gnas nas /
T02TD2519E:101b-25: gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bkug ste g-yab pa ni ku be ra spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-0: @102a * // phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-1: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang pa ni slar btang pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-2: sngags ni aom ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:102a-3: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa gcig tu thal mo sbyar ba byas la /
T02TD2519E:102a-4: srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste bsnol la /
T02TD2519E:102a-5: gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra ba bya /
T02TD2519E:102a-6: mthe bo gnyis rab tu gshibs te bzhag la /
T02TD2519E:102a-7: de gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse sprad nas nang du g-yab pa ni dbang ldan spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-8: de nyid las snga ma ltar mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag pa ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-9: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-10: sngags ni dzrum dzrum shi ba dzrum sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:102a-11: g-yon pa brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la /
T02TD2519E:102a-12: lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la /
T02TD2519E:102a-13: steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus ni /
T02TD2519E:102a-14: tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-15: de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-16: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-19: s'u rya gra ha aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:102a-20: tsandra ya na ksha tra aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:102a-21: rkang pa mnyam par gnas pas 'dug la /
T02TD2519E:102a-22: lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te /
T02TD2519E:102a-23: sor mo rnams mtshams med par rtse mo phan tshun sbyar /
T02TD2519E:102a-24: mthe bo zlum por byas la /
T02TD2519E:102a-25: 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-26: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-27: mdzub mo gnyis btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2519E:102a-28: sngags ni aa dho pri thi bhya: sv'a h'a aa su re bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:102b-0: de nas rang gi sngags de nyid kyis thams cad la @102b 'thor 'thung phul ba bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig / las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsol cig / ces brjod la thams cad slar btang ngo //
T02TD2519E:102b-1: yang na dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2519E:102b-2: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
T02TD2519E:102b-3: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po //
T02TD2519E:102b-4: dri za srin po ga don gyi rigs rnams dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-5: gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
T02TD2519E:102b-6: bu smad tshogs bcas g-yog 'khor dang bcas la //
T02TD2519E:102b-7: bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su //
T02TD2519E:102b-8: thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyis //
T02TD2519E:102b-9: gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir byon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-10: dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-11: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-12: ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-13: chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-14: rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-15: mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu dogs dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-16: g-ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-17: grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-18: khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-19: gtsug lag khang ngam grong khyer gnas dag gam //
T02TD2519E:102b-20: dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni //
T02TD2519E:102b-21: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-22: lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-23: gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-24: dur khrod chen po'am nags tshal chen po'am //
T02TD2519E:102b-25: seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-26: 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-27: gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang //
T02TD2519E:102b-28: lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams //
T02TD2519E:102b-29: rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su //
T02TD2519E:102b-30: phreng ba me tog dri dang byug pa rnams //
T02TD2519E:102b-31: bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul bas //
T02TD2519E:102b-32: 'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su //
T02TD2519E:102b-33: las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02TD2519E:102b-34: de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2519E:103a-1: phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD2519E:103a-2: shar phyogs rdo rje can de lha tshogs bcas //
T02TD2519E:103a-3: gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2519E:103a-4: me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag / chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po ste //
T02TD2519E:103a-5: dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang //
T02TD2519E:103a-6: steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang //
T02TD2519E:103a-7: lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang //
T02TD2519E:103a-8: ri yi lha dang gnong sbyin tshogs rnams la //
T02TD2519E:103a-9: so so so sor gtor ma phul ba rnams //
T02TD2519E:103a-10: rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang //
T02TD2519E:103a-11: rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su ;
T02TD2519E:103a-12: / rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang //
T02TD2519E:103a-13: nang mi dmag dang dpung dang thabs cig tu //
T02TD2519E:103a-14: me tog dri dang byug pa gtor mar bcas //
T02TD2519E:103a-15: 'di rnams btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang //
T02TD2519E:103a-16: bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02TD2519E:103a-17: de la 'di ni phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2519E:103a-18: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharma n'am a'a dya nutpan natva ta /
T02TD2519E:103a-19: de nas nye reg byas la shar phyogs kyi sgo la mngon par bltas te /
T02TD2519E:103a-20: gnas pa'i las thams cad pa'i thab khung gi dbus su dpal khams sum rnams bar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi sngags zlos shing me tog gis bzhugs su gsol la /
T02TD2519E:103a-21: sbyin sreg gi cho gas dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags kyis pa'i mar las sbyin blugs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo //
T02TD2519E:103a-22: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags kyis kyang khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thugs pa'i bar yang sreg blugs bdun bdun dbul lo //
T02TD2519E:103a-23: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa me thab las me tog gi spyan drangs te rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor du rang rang gi gnas su bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o ;
T02TD2519E:103a-24: / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la /
T02TD2519E:103a-25: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02TD2519E:103a-26: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02TD2519E:103a-27: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2519E:103a-28: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2519E:103b-0: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir @103b zhugs pa la snod du gyur pa dang /
T02TD2519E:103b-1: ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo //
T02TD2519E:103b-3: sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa yang mchis te /
T02TD2519E:103b-4: de dag gis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2519E:103b-5: / bcom ldan 'das nor dang bza' ba dang /
T02TD2519E:103b-7: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2519E:103b-8: dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang /
T02TD2519E:103b-9: sngar spyad pa la sogs mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te /
T02TD2519E:103b-10: de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:103b-11: bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang /
T02TD2519E:103b-15: spyod pa la dga' ba rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du chud pas lha gzhan gyi rigs dang dkyil 'khor du 'jug gis /
T02TD2519E:103b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad yang dag par 'gyur ba bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02TD2519E:103b-18: rangs par 'gyur ba der ni bslab pa'i tshig gis 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te /
T02TD2519E:103b-19: de dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang /
T02TD2519E:103b-22: yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang /
T02TD2519E:103b-23: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du /
T02TD2519E:103b-24: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug tu rung ngo //
T02TD2519E:103b-25: bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /
T02TD2519E:103b-27: shes rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis 'bad cing /
T02TD2519E:103b-28: nyon mongs pa dag kyang mchis te /
T02TD2519E:103b-29: de dag kyang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs ma thag tu /
T02TD2519E:103b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'grub par dka' ba ma lags na /
T02TD2519E:104a-0: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ce 'tshal zhes zhu bar @104a * //
T02TD2519E:104a-2: / de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su gzung ba'i dge bsnyen nam /
T02TD2519E:104a-3: dge sbyong ngam dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su blangs la /
T02TD2519E:104a-4: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pas slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te ;
T02TD2519E:104a-5: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:104a-6: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD2519E:104a-7: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2519E:104a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2519E:104a-9: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2519E:104a-10: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD2519E:104a-11: sdom pa rnams kyang stsal du gsol //
T02TD2519E:104a-12: de nas slob ma la rdo rje srung ba yongs su bzlas pa'i ras sngon po'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bskon zhing /
T02TD2519E:104a-13: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo srung bzhi bzlas pa'i gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02TD2519E:104a-14: phyag bzhi byed du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:104a-15: yang lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas ;
T02TD2519E:104a-16: slob dpon la phyag byas la /
T02TD2519E:104a-17: lag na me tog thogs pa nyid dang /
T02TD2519E:104a-19: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD2519E:104a-23: gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol //
T02TD2519E:104a-24: thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa //
T02TD2519E:104a-25: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2519E:104a-26: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni //
T02TD2519E:104a-27: slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la //
T02TD2519E:104a-28: sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba'i //
T02TD2519E:104a-30: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog / gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi //
T02TD2519E:104a-31: gsang ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du //
T02TD2519E:104a-32: slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod //
T02TD2519E:104a-33: mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2519E:104a-34: skal pa chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2519E:104a-35: mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing //
T02TD2519E:104a-36: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2519E:104a-37: sangs rgyas kun ni yid 'ong ba //
T02TD2519E:104a-38: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2519E:104a-39: dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che //
T02TD2519E:104a-40: sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir //
T02TD2519E:104a-41: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur //
T02TD2519E:104a-42: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2519E:104a-43: de nas slob dpon gyis rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:104a-44: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni /
T02TD2519E:104b-0: byang chub @104b sems ni yongs 'dzin cing //
T02TD2519E:104b-1: dam tshig sngom dang gsang ba yi //
T02TD2519E:104b-3: de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:104b-4: gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa //
T02TD2519E:104b-5: gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni //
T02TD2519E:104b-6: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam ;
T02TD2519E:104b-7: / des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya //
T02TD2519E:104b-8: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2519E:104b-9: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02TD2519E:104b-10: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2519E:104b-11: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2519E:104b-12: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2519E:104b-13: blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02TD2519E:104b-14: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02TD2519E:104b-15: shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do //
T02TD2519E:104b-16: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya //
T02TD2519E:104b-17: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02TD2519E:104b-18: 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2519E:104b-19: sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs //
T02TD2519E:104b-20: rin chen rigs mchog chen po dang //
T02TD2519E:104b-21: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2519E:104b-22: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02TD2519E:104b-23: sbyin pa rnams bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02TD2519E:104b-24: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD2519E:104b-25: dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bya //
T02TD2519E:104b-27: dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs //
T02TD2519E:104b-28: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2519E:104b-29: sngom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2519E:104b-30: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2519E:104b-31: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya //
T02TD2519E:104b-32: de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi 'di //
T02TD2519E:104b-33: phas pham par ni rab tu bshad //
T02TD2519E:104b-34: spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste //
T02TD2519E:104b-35: rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do //
T02TD2519E:104b-36: nyid dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2519E:104b-37: nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya //
T02TD2519E:104b-38: gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2519E:104b-39: kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur //
T02TD2519E:104b-40: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //
T02TD2519E:104b-41: ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
T02TD2519E:104b-42: 'dod pa log par mi spyad cing //
T02TD2519E:104b-43: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2519E:104b-44: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi ;
T02TD2519E:104b-45: / chang ni rnam par spang par bya //
T02TD2519E:104b-46: sems can 'dul phyir ma gtogs pa //
T02TD2519E:104b-47: bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //
T02TD2519E:104b-48: dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing //
T02TD2519E:104b-49: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD2519E:104b-50: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02TD2519E:104b-51: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
T02TD2519E:105a-2: ci nus par ni rjes su skyong //
T02TD2519E:105a-3: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya //
T02TD2519E:105a-4: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02TD2519E:105a-5: 'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spangs //
T02TD2519E:105a-6: rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
T02TD2519E:105a-7: lha dang lha min gsang ba la //
T02TD2519E:105a-8: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing ;
T02TD2519E:105a-9: / phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02TD2519E:105a-11: 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD2519E:105a-12: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2519E:105a-13: des kyang 'di skad brjod bya ste //
T02TD2519E:105a-14: slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson //
T02TD2519E:105a-15: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
T02TD2519E:105a-16: de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
T02TD2519E:105a-17: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2519E:105a-18: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa //
T02TD2519E:105a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas //
T02TD2519E:105a-20: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2519E:105a-21: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:105a-22: gang zhig sngom pa 'dzin par mi byed pa de la /
T02TD2519E:105a-23: deng khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste /
T02TD2519E:105a-24: slob dpon gyis rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2519E:105a-25: dbang bskur bar yang mi bya zhing /
T02TD2519E:105a-26: 'jug pa tsam zhig byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2519E:105a-27: de nas aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02TD2519E:105a-28: byang chub sems ni bla med pas //
T02TD2519E:105a-29: dam pa dag ni bskyed nas su //
T02TD2519E:105a-30: de yi snying gar snying pos ni //
T02TD2519E:105a-31: rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya //
T02TD2519E:105a-32: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho: badzra siddhya ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2519E:105a-33: de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2519E:105a-34: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de //
T02TD2519E:105a-35: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhi ma par byas la /
T02TD2519E:105a-37: phyi rol lan gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02TD2519E:105a-38: aom grihna badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya rang nyid kyis bcings la /
T02TD2519E:105a-39: slob ma rnams 'ching du gzhug go //
T02TD2519E:105a-40: rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcings nas //
T02TD2519E:105a-41: yid kyis khros pa dag ba bya zhing //
T02TD2519E:105a-42: rdo rje mthe bo dam pa ste //
T02TD2519E:105a-43: khro bo ti r'inti rir bshad //
T02TD2519E:105a-44: de nas de nyid mthe bo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la /
T02TD2519E:105a-45: aom badzra sa ma ya pra be sha ya mi zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bzhugs par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:105a-46: shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya zhing /
T02TD2519E:105b-0: lho phyogs @105b nas zhags pas gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:105b-1: nub phyogs nas lcags sgrog gis bsdam par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:105b-2: byang phyogs nas rdo rje 'bebs pas dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:105b-3: de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:105b-4: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis //
T02TD2519E:105b-5: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa yang thob na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2519E:105b-6: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyod par bya yis /
T02TD2519E:105b-7: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig / khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD2519E:105b-8: de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang gyen du bstan pa bcings la /
T02TD2519E:105b-9: slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:105b-10: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:105b-11: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2519E:105b-12: mna'i snying po 'di lan cig brjod pa'i chu rdo rje slob ma de nyid 'thung du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:105b-13: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2519E:105b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2519E:105b-15: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad //
T02TD2519E:105b-16: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2519E:105b-17: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2519E:105b-18: aom badzra au da ka sha /
T02TD2519E:105b-19: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:105b-20: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis //
T02TD2519E:105b-21: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02TD2519E:105b-22: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02TD2519E:105b-23: de'i rjes la yi ge aa rdo rje 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan pa rang gi snying gar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:105b-24: de nas slob ma'i snying ga dang dpral ba dang /
T02TD2519E:105b-25: lkog ma dang spyi bo rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i h'um hr'am hr'i: aa 'di dag las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2519E:105b-28: sna tshogs rdo rje go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106a-0: de nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas @106a * //
T02TD2519E:106a-1: rang dang slob ma'i snying gar dbye bar byas nas rang gi snying ga las yi ge aa phyung nas /
T02TD2519E:106a-2: slob ma'i snying ga la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blos bcug ste /
T02TD2519E:106a-3: lus thams cad kun du gang bar gyur par bsams la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2519E:106a-5: 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //
T02TD2519E:106a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02TD2519E:106a-7: rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di //
T02TD2519E:106a-8: de ring nyid du dbab par shog / aom badzra a'a be sha zhes bcu'am /
T02TD2519E:106a-17: brgya bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad sku mdog dkar po 'od zer dmar po kun du 'khrugs pas yongs su gang bar bsams na nges par dbab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:106a-18: yang gal te babs par ma gyur na de'i tshe rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pa bcings la /
T02TD2519E:106a-19: rkang pa g-yon pas de'i rkang pa g-yas pa mnan nas de nyid la dbab par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2519E:106a-20: steng gi nam mkha'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi steng na khros pas yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis mnan par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2519E:106a-21: 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor yi ge h'um gis 'degs par gyur la /
T02TD2519E:106a-22: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa shar phyogs la sogs par bzhugs pas /
T02TD2519E:106a-24: zhes bya ba'i rang rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyi 'od kyi tshogs yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad par bsam zhing h'um badzra a'a be sha aa zhes lan brgya zlos shing de dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106a-25: gal te sdig pa shin tu che bas babs par ma gyur na sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106a-27: yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me //
T02TD2519E:106a-28: ral par rdo rje khro bo yi //
T02TD2519E:106a-29: mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms zhugs la //
T02TD2519E:106a-30: til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shis //
T02TD2519E:106a-31: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2519E:106b-0: zhes @106b bya ba dang lag pa g-yas pa'i steng du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02TD2519E:106b-1: h'um dbus su bsam pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bos sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106b-2: de nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje'i lus la 'bar bas sdig pa rnams bsreg par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106b-3: de nas yang rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya de bzhin du bcings la dbab pa byas na nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:106b-4: de lta bus kyang 'bab par ma gyur pa gang yin pa de la dbang bskur bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106b-5: babs nas skad cig ma de nyid la mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:106b-6: de nas babs par shes pa dang /
T02TD2519E:106b-7: aom rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na //
T02TD2519E:106b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pas glu blangs la /
T02TD2519E:106b-9: khro bo'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin du sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106b-10: gal te babs nas rdo rje sems dpas khro bo'i khu tshur bcings nas de'i tshe slob dpon gyis rdo rje khu tshur gyi khro bo'i khu tshur bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106b-11: de bzhin du gal te rdo rje bzhad pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur bcings nas de'i tshe rdo rje chos kyi khro bo'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2519E:106b-12: de lta bus ni byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:106b-13: de nas de'i lce la rdo rje bsams la smros shig / rdo rje zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106b-14: de nas ni thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:106b-15: de nas pra t'i tstsha badzra ho:/
T02TD2519E:106b-16: zhes bya bas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106b-17: de nas gang du babs par gyur pa de nyid la 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:106b-18: de nas aom pra ti gri hna stvam hi m'am satva ma h'a ba la zhes bya bas phreng ba de de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106b-20: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2519E:106b-21: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD2519E:106b-22: mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de //
T02TD2519E:106b-23: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02TD2519E:106b-24: he badzra p'a shya zhes bya ba 'dis gdong g-yongs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:106b-25: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02TD2519E:106b-26: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:107a-0: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma'i snying gar dbab pa'i @107a * //
T02TD2519E:107a-1: phyag rgya dgrol du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:107a-2: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang ngam phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar sgo la mngon par phyogs par bris la der slob ma bzhag ste /
T02TD2519E:107a-3: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2519E:107a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs la dbang bskur bar bya ba ni /
T02TD2519E:107a-6: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02TD2519E:107a-7: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2519E:107a-8: dung dang rol mo la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:107a-9: de nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas mngon par dga' bar bya zhing /
T02TD2519E:107a-10: dang por re zhig chu'i dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2519E:107a-11: de nas ni phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2519E:107a-14: rdo rje dang bdag po dang /
T02TD2519E:107a-15: ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas yang me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:107a-16: slob mas kyang thal mo bskor te /
T02TD2519E:107a-17: slob dpon la phyag byas la yon gyi mchog phul te me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba yang blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:107a-18: slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba ni ji skad du bstan pa'i gnas su rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bzhag la /
T02TD2519E:107a-19: de'i lus la dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bkod de /
T02TD2519E:107a-20: aom badzra aa dhri pa ti tvam aa bhi shinytsa mi dri dhro me bha ba dza: h'um bam ho: h'um phat ces bya ba 'dis yang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:107a-21: de nas 'di nyid zlos shing rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
T02TD2519E:107a-22: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba zlos shing chu'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:107a-23: 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:107a-24: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2519E:107a-25: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD2519E:107a-26: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ster //
T02TD2519E:107a-27: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chus 'grub bo //
T02TD2519E:107a-28: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2519E:107a-29: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02TD2519E:107a-30: skye bo 'dus pa'i nang gnas na //
T02TD2519E:107a-31: dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur //
T02TD2519E:107b-0: de nas cho ga thams @107b cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2519E:107b-1: slob ma la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02TD2519E:107b-2: tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba byin nas gzengs bstod pa dang /
T02TD2519E:107b-3: lung bstan pas slob ma thams cad la lung bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:107b-4: de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:107b-5: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa bcug nas dkyil 'khor dang lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid thams cad dang /
T02TD2519E:107b-6: slob dpon gyi las thams cad bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:107b-7: 'di tsam gyis ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD2519E:107b-8: yang na rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam yongs su dor bar dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad tsam gyi khru bzhi pa la 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs /
T02TD2519E:107b-9: sgo nub tu bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon sna lngas bris pa de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris nas /
T02TD2519E:107b-10: de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba legs par bris nas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du dkyil 'khor de mchod la glang po che'i gdan la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dar gyis bkab pa la /
T02TD2519E:107b-11: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas la de'i dbus su bzhag la /
T02TD2519E:107b-12: dbang bskur bar 'os pa de yang de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas ;
T02TD2519E:107b-13: gdan gyi steng na g-yon brkyang pa'i gnas pas dbang phyug chen po'i steng du ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas /
T02TD2519E:107b-14: glang po che'i steng du bla res bres pa dang /
T02TD2519E:107b-15: g-yas logs su rdo rje h'um mdzad bzlas pa'i dar dang me tog gi chun 'phyang dang /
T02TD2519E:107b-16: rin po che'i tog can gyi gdugs kyis brgyan pa dang /
T02TD2519E:107b-17: g-yon logs su yi ge aom bzlas pa'i gos sna tshogs dang /
T02TD2519E:107b-18: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs bsgreng ba bzhag ste /
T02TD2519E:107b-19: mchod yon byin nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2519E:107b-20: dung dang rnga bo che dang /
T02TD2519E:107b-22: zangs dung la sogs pa rol mo'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2519E:107b-23: phyi rol du gar dang glu dang rol mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2519E:107b-24: yon gyi mchog blangs nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02TD2519E:107b-25: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bstod pas bstod la /
T02TD2519E:107b-26: dang por ni bum pa gang bas so //
T02TD2519E:108a-1: nas rdo rje lcags skyu la sogs pa'i sngags zlos shin de'i bum pas so //
T02TD2519E:108a-2: de'i rjes la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la des dbang bskur zhing 'thung du yang bcug nas /
T02TD2519E:108a-3: bum pas yang dbang bskur ba ni chu'i dbang bskur ba nyid do'o /
T02TD2519E:108a-4: de la sbyor ba ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2519E:108a-5: aom badzra aom ku sha ma h'a kro dha a'a karsha ya sarba sa ma ya h'um dza: badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du /
T02TD2519E:108a-6: aom badzra dzva la aagni pr'a d'i pti a'a karsha ya sarba ta th'a ga tam ma h'a badzra sa ma ya h'um dza: badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba'i bar ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i dbang bskur ba ste /
T02TD2519E:108a-7: sbyor ba lhag ma ni sngar bshad pa nyid yin no //
T02TD2519E:108a-11: rdo rje dang bdag po dang /
T02TD2519E:108a-12: ming gi dbang bskur ba byin la /
T02TD2519E:108a-14: chos dang dam tshig kyang byin nas me tog dang sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2519E:108a-15: rin po che'i mig thur ram /
T02TD2519E:108a-16: gser la sogs pa'i thur ma thogs la /
T02TD2519E:108a-17: mdun du 'dug nas tshig 'di skad du gsal bar brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2519E:108a-18: de ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2519E:108a-19: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02TD2519E:108a-20: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2519E:108a-21: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2519E:108a-23: aom badzra nee tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hr'i: zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2519E:108a-24: de nas me long blangs la chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:108a-25: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2519E:108a-26: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2519E:108a-27: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2519E:108a-28: rgyu dang las la kun du 'byung //
T02TD2519E:108a-29: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02TD2519E:108a-30: de ltar chos 'di shes nas su //
T02TD2519E:108a-31: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD2519E:108a-32: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02TD2519E:108a-33: de nas aa las byung ba'i chos kyi dril bu dkrol du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:108a-34: chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2519E:108a-35: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2519E:108a-36: nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2519E:108a-37: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02TD2519E:108a-38: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byos /
T02TD2519E:108b-1: gzhu byin la phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi dang /
T02TD2519E:108b-2: steng du gcig 'og tu gcig 'phen du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:108b-3: ho zhes bya ba ni mnga' sbyin pa'i snying po'o //
T02TD2519E:108b-4: yang me long blangs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:108b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02TD2519E:108b-6: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2519E:108b-7: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni //
T02TD2519E:108b-8: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02TD2519E:108b-9: 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:108b-10: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po byang chub kyi sems ni 'di yin par shes par gyis shig / de la me long gi sngags ni aom badzra satva zhes bya'o //
T02TD2519E:108b-11: de nas rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag la lag pa g-yas su dung byin la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:108b-12: deng nas brtsams te sems ba skyed pa //
T02TD2519E:108b-13: tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2519E:108b-14: di ring phan chad 'jig rten la /
T02TD2519E:108b-15: skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2519E:108b-16: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02TD2519E:108b-17: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis //
T02TD2519E:108b-18: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2519E:108b-19: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02TD2519E:108b-20: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
T02TD2519E:108b-21: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2519E:108b-22: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02TD2519E:108b-23: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02TD2519E:108b-24: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
T02TD2519E:108b-25: ces bya bas rdo rje 'khor lo dang rdo rje smra ba'i chos kyi yi ge dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:108b-27: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2519E:108b-28: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2519E:108b-30: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2519E:108b-31: de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
T02TD2519E:108b-32: padma dang nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba yang sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:108b-33: de nas thams cad gzengs bstod pas //
T02TD2519E:108b-34: kun du sangs rgyas bdag bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2519E:108b-35: rdo rje ming dbang bskur bas kyang //
T02TD2519E:108b-36: de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan nyid //
T02TD2519E:108b-37: aom 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan yin //
T02TD2519E:108b-38: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2519E:109a-2: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02TD2519E:109a-3: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa /
T02TD2519E:109a-4: siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sv'a: de la gzengs bstod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2519E:109a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2519E:109a-6: g-yon pas chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2519E:109a-7: g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02TD2519E:109a-8: de nas slob ma rnams dbugs dbyung ba byas la /
T02TD2519E:109a-9: thams cad la gsang ba'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:109a-10: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02TD2519E:109a-11: khams gsum na ni sdig med de //
T02TD2519E:109a-12: de bas 'dod la chags bral bar ;
T02TD2519E:109a-13: / khyed kyis nam yang ma byed cig / mah'a sa ma ya ha na phat /
T02TD2519E:109a-14: de nas sngags byin la rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:109a-15: cho ga 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2519E:109a-16: khyod kyis gzhan phyag rgya mi mkhas pa gang la yang phyag rgya gcig tsam yang ston par ma byed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD2519E:109a-17: 'di ltar sems can de rnams kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing ba la sbyor bar byed kyang /
T02TD2519E:109a-18: de rnams kyis dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du thob par mi 'gyur ba dang de nas da som nyi za bar gyur pas yang ba ma spangs par myur ba nyid du dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur la /
T02TD2519E:109a-19: rgyu des khyod kyang ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:109a-20: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad dang me tog la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par mchod la thams cad la ci nus bar mchod do zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab nas bdug spos la sogs pas ci 'dod par mchod pa byed du bcug la /
T02TD2519E:109a-21: ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams la 'byor ba ci yod pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2519E:109a-22: dkyil 'khor chen por phul ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis tshim par byas nas /
T02TD2519E:109a-23: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2519E:109a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:109a-25: de nas yang thams cad sul yang smra bar ma byed cig / ces bsgo la mna'i snying po brjod par bya'o//
T02TD2519E:109b-0: @109b de nas zhugs pa rnams slar btang nas /
T02TD2519E:109b-1: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02TD2519E:109b-2: sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas lha chen po chung ma dang bcas pa snga ma bzhin du blangs la mchod nas /
T02TD2519E:109b-3: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2519E:109b-4: dge pa'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi don du bsngos la /
T02TD2519E:109b-5: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te badzra mu: zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya gang dang gang nas byung ba'i gnas de dang de nyid nas dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:109b-6: de nas aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa sarba mu dra mu bam zhes bya ba 'dis snying gnas byung ba rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gnas pas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2519E:109b-7: mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcing bar byas nas de bzhin du go cha bgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:109b-8: de la rdo rje rin chen 'dis rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya mthe bong snyoms mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mor sbyar nas go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing bar byas la badzra tu shya ho zhes bya ba 'di dang mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2519E:109b-9: yang phyag byas la bdag gis cho ga ma tshang bar bgyis pa gang lags pa de thams cad bdag la bzod par mdzod cig / ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab nas khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2519E:109b-10: yi ge h'um bzhi zlos bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gshegs su gsol ba'i phyir /
T02TD2519E:109b-11: yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:109b-12: aom kri tva ba sarba satva aartha siddhi y'a tha nu ga / gatstsha dha rma buddha bi shva yam /
T02TD2519E:109b-13: pu na r'a ga ma na ya du ma'i mtha' dang bcas pa'i h'um bzhi zlos shing khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya gyen du dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:109b-14: de lta bus ni thams cad gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2519E:109b-15: ji lta ba bzhin du sbrul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa ni yid kyi legs pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus la bcug la yi ge brgya pa dang /
T02TD2519E:109b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su bzlas nas rdo rje srung ba dang /
T02TD2519E:110a-1: tshur gyis bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:110a-2: de nas aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharma n'am a'a dya nu tpanna tt'a ta ces zlos shing dkyil 'khor phyis la dman pa la sogs pa chu bor dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:110a-3: de nas h'um bzhis phur bu bton la aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la ti shtha siddha lo tsa ni sarba aartha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a zhes bya ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i 'o mas phur bu dang /
T02TD2519E:110a-4: gzugs brnyan thams cad bkru bar bya zhing khung bu yang dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD2519E:110a-5: dkyil 'khor cho ga byas pa las //
T02TD2519E:110a-6: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags de //
T02TD2519E:110a-7: kun dga' snying po drag po mchog /'jig rten kun mkhyen nyid gyur cig / dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las btus pa /
T02TD2519E:110a-8: slob dpon kun dga' snying po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2519E:110a-10: // /'di'i gzhung tshad ni shlo ka stong nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga yod do //
T02TD2519E:110a-11: rdo rje ye shes mngon 'dod pa'i //
T02TD2519E:110a-12: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02TD2519E:110a-13: bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2519E:110a-14: rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba yin//
